page.title: 04 Farming Around Newmillerdam
page.content: There is a lot of farm land in our area the majority of which is growing barley and wheat.The advantage for the farmers in this area is that the land is very flat. When we were doing our survey the most noticeable crop on the land was rape seed. The fields growing this crop were a beautiful bright yellow and as the wheat and barley were not yet ripe it made the land look like a patchwork of yellow and green. Rape seed is used for manufactur- ing vegetable oils and soap. Some of the farmers have changed to growing rape seed because they can get more money for it than other crops. There is some dairy farming carried on but not on a big scale because the local farmers find it difficult to compete with the big dairies.
